document_data.name: Nalabukhar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Nalabukharn''' or '''Nalabukhar'''The "Nalabukharn" spelling appears to be in error, as it appears only once, while the "Nalabukhar" spelling appears twice. were a fabled family of [[Calishite]] sorcerers, extinct by the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were rumored to possess certain [[Orb of power (Nalabukhar)|orbs of power]].{{cite book/Secrets of the Magister}}
